transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ji good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Ji aawaz aa rahi hai aapko? DiDi Panchi baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se account manager.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Ji toh kya issue hai aapka?
Customer: Aapne call kiya tha.
Customer: Mere ko issue aisa hai madam mere ko na Iran ka Sadaf N330 carbon chahiye.
Customer: Imported lekin na IndiaMART se mere ko message aa rahe hai lekin sab fake message hai madam sab matlab logo ko physical stock ka photo bhejne bol raha hu PC bhejne ko bol raha hu toh alag hi bhech rahe bol rahe Sadaf hai lekin Sadaf nahi hai toh main bol raha hu ki baba aapka kahan pe hai kya hai mere ko batao main stock check karta hu payment karke mal utha leta hu lekin sab fake hai bolte pehla payment karo uske baad ye karo tabhi hum stock dikhayenge toh this is very dangerous.
Customer: Aapka sir new aapke paas aisa koi supplier hai jo N330 Sadaf Iran se import karta hai jo 15-20 saal hai aur wo karta hai toh uska mere ko number bhejo because main jaise abhi teen char din se main entry kar raha hu na toh nahi nahi toh bhi hai na ek saal do saal renew hue ek toh New Bombay ka hai ek toh Pune ka hai aur matlab wo jis hisab se baat karte hai na toh wo paanch se cheh jan pura fraud dikh rahe wo log.
Customer: Aur continue kitne call kar rahe hai ki are payment karwa do payment karwa do main baad mein bol diya bhai.
Customer: Toh haan toh main bola nahi hoga wo to mere ko.
Executive: Mujhe batayiye jo aap.
Customer: Haan mujhe batayiye jo aap buyer consume karte hai uske seller ka number chahiye ya kis seller ka ya phir usko particular product mere ko purchase karna hai madam mere ko purchase karna hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Jaise aapne mera mera mera product list update kiya hai waisa ye Sadaf N330 Iran ka carbon hai ye koi sale karne wala aapke paas banda hoga wo kharidna hai mere ko toh uska jo actual karte hai uska detail nahi aa raha hai koi toh alag ab bande log ka hi number aa raha hai aur wo bhi fake aa raha hai aur wo kya kar rahe hai facebook waha se photo nikal rahe hai wo search kar rahe hai aur wo bhijwa rahe hai maine unko bola bhi sir ye photo aapka stock ka nahi hai ye Iran ka facebook ka warehouse ka hai ye mere paas bhi hai nahi nahi hamare warehouse ke main bola nahi ye fake kam mat karo otherwise mere IndiaMART mein main complaint kar dunga main.
Executive: Sir mujhe bataye jaise ki aap buyer consume karte hai.
Customer: Toh matlab usse aapko response fake mila hai yahi bol rahe hai na response waha pe bhi fake mila aapko.
Customer: Haan wo bhi fake mil raha hai na madam kya trust pe karo chalo apna toh business ke liye apne ko ek kilo do kilo sample ke liye pareshan ho raha hu aur mere ko koi abhi naya supplier kuch naya material purchase karna hai wo hai mere paas available lekin mera import aane wala hai bahut dino ke baad ek around do mahina lagega lekin abhi stock jo hai actual seller milna chahiye na madam actual seller hi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Pata hai sir main dekho aapko kafi time se main call kar rahi thi matlab mujhe ek mahina toh ho gaya aapko daily basis pe whatsapp pe bhi main message karti thi calls bhi karti thi ki sir video meeting ke regarding ya phir business ke regarding baat karne ke liye aap thode busy rehte the jyada toh koi baat nahi ek bar video meeting mein discuss kar lenge sari cheeze kya issue hai aapko waha pe properly aapke liye bhi useful hoga mere liye bhi useful hoga samjhana sari cheeze theek hai na.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Ek bar main aapko link share karti hu please aap usko join kar lijiye.
Customer: Haan kar do share kar do kitna minute ka rahega ye?
Executive: Paanch 10 minute ka.
Customer: Haan karo karo karo. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving fake messages for Sadaf N330 carbon.

- Wants genuine suppliers for Sadaf N330 carbon.

- Frustrated with fake photos and payment requests.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss issues.

- Executive will share a link for the meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share meeting link with customer.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- fake suppliers, carbon, video meeting, purchase
